products.title: Vitra Blackout White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Vitra blackout is one of their most popular ranges available in a variety of vibrant colours at an affordable price. Revamp your home or office space with a stunning vitra blackout white vertical blind. Product id: sdb-vtb0426 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes vitra blackout white 89mm vertical blind in white.

products.title: Vitra White Vertical Blind
products.description: A blackout fabric which provides a block of colour. Available in other colours. Vitra white vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Vitra White (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
